_description: LLM guidance for contact flow creation

required: session set with instance_id and region

step2_prepareContent.critical: Contact flow content MUST be a JSON string, not an object
step2_prepareContent.action: Use json.dumps() on the template content before passing to API

flowTypes.CUSTOMER_QUEUE: Plays while customer waits in queue
flowTypes.CUSTOMER_HOLD: Plays while customer is on hold
flowTypes.CUSTOMER_WHISPER: Plays to customer before agent connects
flowTypes.AGENT_HOLD: Plays to agent while customer is on hold
flowTypes.AGENT_WHISPER: Plays to agent before connecting to customer

templateCustomization.queueIds: Replace placeholder queue IDs with actual queue IDs from config_create_queue
templateCustomization.promptText: Customize MessageParticipant text for your organization
templateCustomization.lambdaArns: Replace Lambda ARNs if using integrations

commonErrors.InvalidContactFlowException: Content is not valid JSON string - use json.dumps()
commonErrors.ResourceNotFoundException: Queue ID or other referenced resource doesn't exist
